channel.title: Players not allowed in
channel.description:
K i used the tutorial that said how to stop certain names to stop from entering ur server like syi or % and stuff. BUt the tut used like a different source than mine so it doesnt work. Here is part of my client tell or show wat i should do to it so it bans syi.
receivedPlayerName = receivedPlayerName.replaceAll("_", " "); i tried adding like , "syi" didnt work
please help
